heading: HB02317
0: AN ACT TO EXCLUDE FROM THE OPERATION OF PROCLAMATION NO. 217, SERIES OF 1929, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE CENTRAL CORDILLERA FOREST RESERVE, A CERTAIN PORTION OF LAND EMBRACED THEREIN AND DECLARE THE SAME ALIENABLE AND DISPOSABLE UNDER SECTION 4 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10023, (RESIDENTIAL FREE PATENT ACT) DATED MARCH 9, 2010, IN FAVOR OF THE LUIS HORA MEMORIAL REGIONAL HOSPITAL LOCATED IN ABATAN, BAUKO, MOUNTAIN PROVINCE FOR HOSPITAL PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on NATURAL RESOURCES since 2016-08-09
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02317
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO EXCLUDE FROM THE OPERATION OF PROCLAMATION NO. 217, SERIES OF 1929, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE CENTRAL CORDILLERA FOREST RESERVE, A CERTAIN PORTION OF LAND EMBRACED THEREIN AND DECLARE THE SAME ALIENABLE AND DISPOSABLE UNDER SECTION 4 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10023, (RESIDENTIAL FREE PATENT ACT) DATED MARCH 9, 2010, IN FAVOR OF THE LUIS HORA MEMORIAL REGIONAL HOSPITAL LOCATED IN ABATAN, BAUKO, MOUNTAIN PROVINCE FOR HOSPITAL PURPOSES
